titleStmt.title: Prides fall: or, A warning for all English women By the example of a strange monster, born of late in Germany, by a merchants proud wife in Geneva. The tune is, All you that love good fellows.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and I. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing, which estimates 1663-1674 as publication date.
In two parts; woodcut at head of first part. Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (2123.2:64, 65); University of Glasgow Library (2691:51).
